title: Scripters/Helpers goes unpunished
body:
So i decided to write this in frustration of the lack of attention this issue is getting.
Why does riot even have a report/tribunal system if they are not going to use it?
Investigating matters take too long and people who use hacks (scripts) go with no consequence. 
It is to the point the people using helper programs will use it at will without any fear of getting an ip ban or any penalty. 
I'm not sure if RIOT has any course of action to do anything about this, seems unlikely as the number of players using helper programs are increasing drastically. 
Makes the game pretty unenjoyable and unfair to those who don't.


In common they were all last season bronze, have excessive games on kogmaw, sivir, corki and are having winrates close to 70%. 
Not saying this isn't possible, its the process in how they do so which is unfair.
Or does RIOT not care at all and just try to sugar coat how lazy they are and take no action?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I understand your frustration, however the boards are not the place to report these kinds of issues as there is a strict "[naming and shaming](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)" policy, I suggest you remove the offending players names from your post as soon as possible or you risk your thread being removed.

Because your post is so long, i'm going to answer you by quoting parts of your post.

>Why does riot even have a report/tribunal system if they are not going to use it?
Investigating matters take too long and people who use hacks (scripts) go with no consequence.

The report system is used extensively in the catching of cheaters/exploiters, please do continue to report these players. Don't forget, bans for the use of scripts/third party tools are handed down in waves so while you may continue to see these people in games don't think they're not going to be punished.

If you feel you need to submit further evidence regarding a cheater/exploiter, or you forget to report in the end-game, please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will send the report along to the correct people. Note: You will not receive feedback on any punishment the player receives, so don't expect it.

>Or does RIOT not care at all and just try to sugar coat how lazy they are and take no action?

Believe me, Riot does care and they're constantly working to ensure every player can have a great experience in this game, in fact there was a recent wave of bans that came down for use of illegal third party programs/scripts, as evidenced by the many threads made on the boards recently from people claiming they were wrongly banned.

It's been over a week since these players have been constantly reported not only by me but by many other players because they continue to use these programs. They don't even attempt to pretend they don't have it. They use it as if it were legal. And to say they don't go unpunished? No action has been taken by RIOT. There is more frustration that no action is taken rather than the actual players using illegal 3rd party programs. They are relentless because they go unpunished.
